channel.title: How to change wat NPCS say?
channel.description:
On reapage scape v2 source I edited it a bit but noticed how npcs still say things like " Welcome to Reapage scape! " and " join the reapage scape forums! ", how do i change what they say to like " Welcome to < my server name > scape! "?
OOH ALSO! When i log in, there's a pop up that u can exit out of saying " WELCOME TO REAPAGE SCAPE! " and when u first log on in the message box it'll say " Welcome to reapage scape! " how do i change those messages to my servername scape?

item.title: How to change wat NPCS say?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.source: How to change wat NPCS say?

item.title: How to change wat NPCS say?
item.dc:creator: @m_is_ftw m is ftw
item.description:
@m_is_ftw wrote:

no… open npc handler and do ctr+f and put in welcome to repagescape.not in client.java

Read full topic
item.source: How to change wat NPCS say?

item.title: How to change wat NPCS say?
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

search what it says in client.java.
If the NPC says “Welcome to reapagescape” Search that and change it[quote=“Darksterlin, post:1, topic:277435”]On reapage scape v2 source I edited it a bit but noticed how npcs still say things like " Welcome to Reapage scape! " and " join the reapage scape forums! ", how do i change what they say to like " Welcome to < my server name > scape! "?

OOH ALSO! When i log in, there’s a pop up that u can exit out of saying " WELCOME TO REAPAGE SCAPE! " and when u first log on in the message box it’ll say " Welcome to reapage scape! " how do i change those messages to my servername scape?[/quote]

Read full topic
